ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dgradd.1 | |- M = ( deg ` F ) |
| 2 |  | dgradd.2 | |- N = ( deg ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( coeff ` F ) = ( coeff ` F ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( coeff ` G ) = ( coeff ` G ) |
| 5 | 3, 4, 1, 2 | #P_coeaddlem | |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> ( ( coeff ` ( F oF + G ) ) = ( ( coeff ` F ) oF + ( coeff ` G ) ) /\ ( deg ` ( F oF + G ) ) <_ if ( M <_ N , N , M ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> ( deg ` ( F oF + G ) ) <_ if ( M <_ N , N , M ) ) |
